title: Demand Forecasting & Analytics
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just build products — they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that encourages the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it. Imagine what you could do here! At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly.
description: Apple Sales Finance serves as the hub of financial information and decision support. We are seeking a professional in their career with a proven track record of accomplishments. You will be a key contributor in a fast-paced, goal-oriented environment with the ability to influence strategic decisions. You will: Prepare weekly country/key account forecasts in close collaboration with sales teams and provide ad hoc analysis, preparation of reporting for quarterly reviews. Engage with country/regional sales teams to understand business priorities as well as the short-term and long-term drivers of performance within products, countries and partners.
preferred_qualifications: Strong experience building relationships at all levels of the organization and influencing to improve forecast accuracy across multiple business lines in a cross functional environment. Excellent attention to detail and capable of providing broad perspective, articulate understanding of sales/commercial/business and offer solutions based advice to problems. Outstanding business support and analytical skills as well as planning and organizing skills. Deep experience working with large data sets. Strong presentation skills both in person and virtually. Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting or relevant field.
